concept.title: Defining the RPC ID
concept.shortdesc: The RPC ID is a user-defined identifier that allows an RPC origin and RPC destination to recognize each other.

conbody.p: RPC pipelinesRPC IDRPC IDin RPC origins and destinationsTo enable the RPC destination to write directly to an RPC origin, create a single RPC ID and use it in both stages.
To write to multiple pipelines, use the RPC ID in the RPC destination and all RPC origins.
